paper_abstract: The origin of all 4-phase Golay sequences and Golay sequence pairs of even length at most 26 is explained. The principal techniques are the three-stage construction of Fiedler, Jedwab and Parker involving multi-dimensional Golay arrays, and a "sum-difference" construction that modifies a result due to Eliahou, Kervaire and Saffari. The existence of 4-phase seed pairs of lengths 3, 5, 11, and 13 is assumed; their origin is considered in (Gibson and Jedwab, Des Codes Cryptogr, 2010).
paper_title: Quaternary Golay sequence pairs I: even length
